title: Sony and Nature announce 2026 Women in Technology Award winners

title: Killin water supply contaminated after diesel leak
desc: Residents in the village of Killin reported a solvent smell and taste to their water on Friday.

title: Oliver Glasner could leave Crystal Palace imminently as he makes new bizarre public statement
desc: Oliver Glasner has suggested he could leave Crystal Palace imminently and is 'just not good enough right now'.

title: Sweden Moves Forward with First Contracts Awarded for Ostlänken High-Speed Rail
desc: Sweden is taking a massive leap forward in its national rail modernization program following the awarding of the first major construction contracts for the Ostlänken (Eastern Link). This monumental 160-kilometer, double-track high-speed railway will connect Järna (just south of Stockholm) to Linköping, fundamentally altering the transit geography of the region. title: Mourinho made 'unacceptable, huge mistake' - Kompany
desc: Bayern Munich boss Vincent Kompany says Jose Mourinho made a "huge mistake" with his "unacceptable" post-match comments after the alleged racial abuse of Real Madrid winger Vinicius Jr.

title: FIFA and Peace Board pledge to help Gaza reconstruction through football
